purpose: Determine the appropriate response state based on user input patterns, without issuing directives or urgency.

safety_override.description: Used only when user reports medical emergency or explicit danger.

external_support_check.description: Used when symptoms persist or worsen despite repeated slowing and stabilization.

slow_down_check.description: Used when increased symptoms, anxiety, overload, or intolerance appear.

hold_steady_check.description: Used when symptoms are present but stable or improving slightly.

ready_for_next_layer_check.description: Used when stability has been maintained without escalation.

observe_more_default.description: Fallback when data is incomplete or mixed.

constraints: Never skip slow_down before external_support unless safety_override
